test-case.name: cbcl-boolean-less-than-001
test-case.test: declare function local:is-even($arg as xs:integer) as xs:boolean { (($arg mod 2) eq 0) }; not(local:is-even(15) le local:is-even(17))

test-case.name: cbcl-boolean-less-than-002
test-case.test: declare function local:is-even($arg as xs:integer) as xs:boolean { (($arg mod 2) eq 0) }; fn:true() le local:is-even(17)

test-case.name: cbcl-boolean-less-than-003
test-case.test: declare function local:is-even($arg as xs:integer) as xs:boolean { (($arg mod 2) eq 0) }; fn:false() le local:is-even(17)

test-case.name: cbcl-boolean-less-than-004
test-case.test: declare function local:is-even($arg as xs:integer) as xs:boolean { (($arg mod 2) eq 0) }; not(local:is-even(15) lt local:is-even(17))

test-case.name: cbcl-boolean-less-than-005
test-case.test: declare function local:is-even($arg as xs:integer) as xs:boolean { (($arg mod 2) eq 0) }; fn:true() lt local:is-even(17)

test-case.name: cbcl-boolean-less-than-006
test-case.test: declare function local:is-even($arg as xs:integer) as xs:boolean { (($arg mod 2) eq 0) }; fn:false() lt local:is-even(17)

test-case.name: cbcl-boolean-less-than-007
test-case.test: declare function local:is-even($arg as xs:integer) as xs:boolean { (($arg mod 2) eq 0) }; local:is-even(17) le fn:true()

test-case.name: cbcl-boolean-less-than-008
test-case.test: declare function local:is-even($arg as xs:integer) as xs:boolean { (($arg mod 2) eq 0) }; local:is-even(17) le fn:false()

test-case.name: cbcl-boolean-less-than-009
test-case.test: declare function local:is-even($arg as xs:integer) as xs:boolean { (($arg mod 2) eq 0) }; local:is-even(17) lt fn:true()

test-case.name: cbcl-boolean-less-than-010
test-case.test: declare function local:is-even($arg as xs:integer) as xs:boolean { (($arg mod 2) eq 0) }; local:is-even(17) lt fn:false()
